reminder: Avoid backbiting today 2
hadith: The believer is not one who eats his fill while his neighbor goes hungry.

reminder: Say 'La ilaha illallah' with sincerity
hadith: The best remembrance is La ilaha illallah.

reminder: Avoid arguing, even if you are right
hadith: I guarantee a house in Paradise for one who gives up arguing, even if he is right.

reminder: Say something nice or stay silent
hadith: Let him who believes in Allah and the Last Day speak good, or keep silent.

reminder: Make someone laugh today (without mocking)
hadith: Smiling in the face of your brother is charity.

reminder: Say 'SubhanAllah' 33 times today
hadith: Two words that are light on the tongue, heavy on the scales.

reminder: Forgive someone in your heart
hadith: Be merciful to others and you will receive mercy.

reminder: Be patient with someone who annoys you
hadith: No one can be given a blessing better than patience.

reminder: Visit or call a family member
hadith: Whoever wishes to have his rizq increased should maintain ties of kinship.

reminder: Send peace and blessings upon the Prophet ï·º
hadith: Whoever sends blessings upon me once, Allah will send blessings upon him ten times.

reminder: Pick up trash from the road
hadith: Removing harmful things from the road is charity.

reminder: Be kind to your parents today
hadith: Paradise lies at the feet of your mother.

reminder: Smile to your brother
hadith: Smiling in the face of your brother is charity.

reminder: Give a sincere compliment to someone
hadith: A good word is charity.

reminder: Help someone carry something
hadith: Helping someone with their load is charity.

reminder: Say Salam to those you know and don't know
hadith: Spread peace among yourselves.

reminder: Give a small amount of charity
hadith: Charity does not decrease wealth.

reminder: Say 'Alhamdulillah' after sneezing
hadith: When one of you sneezes, let him say Alhamdulillah.

reminder: Make dua for someone without them knowing
hadith: The supplication of a Muslim for his brother in his absence is answered.

reminder: Say 'Astaghfirullah' often
hadith: Seek forgiveness from Allah, for I seek forgiveness from Him one hundred times a day.
